JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description      Analyse customer requirements to prepare solution designs that align with business goals.   You will be responsible for both software development and technical consultancy, gathering and reviewing specifications, and participating in on-site workshops   Deliver high quality custom development solutions in line with defined customer requirements and the company standards   Resolve complex technical tasks writing secure, reliable, scalable and maintainable code.   You will ensure quality of deliverables remains in line with agreed standards within scope and budget   Implement and execute relevant Unit & Integration tests; debug and resolve technical problems that arise.   Support in project estimation, planning and risk management activities.
